# alternates between bars and spaces, always begins with bar
# 0 for narrow, 1 for wide
0: 0000011
1: 0000110
2: 0001001
3: 1100000
4: 0010010
5: 1000010
6: 0100001
7: 0100100
8: 0110000
9: 1001000
-: 0001100
$: 0011000
:: 1000101
/: 1010001
.: 1010100
+: 0010101
A: 0011010
B: 0101001
C: 0001011
D: 0001110
